name: Nido Force
description:
Parts of the world are suddenly suspended in the air!
Nido Nakano, wandering hero, decides to investigate the events.
Is someone trying to steal world pieces for themselves?

Play the game by running gloome.exe; no further setup is required.

The engine is GLOOME, a fork of GZDoom made specifically for independent game projects. For more information, check out the inclosed readme.
